'''Athel Pottery Shelf''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Athel Pottery Shelf is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Wadi Al-Majuj]] after defeating an [[Eremite Axe Vanguard]].
